mapper.select: SELECT BRAND_NAME, BRAND_LOGO_FILE FROM BRAND WHERE BRAND_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SHOP_NUM DESC) AS NUM, SHOP_NUM, SHOP_BRAND, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_TEL, SHOP_ADD, SHOP_POS1, SHOP_POS2, SHOP_START_TIME, SHOP_END_TIME FROM SHOP WHERE SHOP_DEL_GB = 'N' AND SHOP_JOIN_APPROVE = 'Y' AND SHOP_BRAND = #{BRAND_NAME}) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{START} AND #{END} AND SHOP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(SHOP_NUM) SHOP_COUNT FROM SHOP WHERE SHOP_DEL_GB = 'N' AND SHOP_JOIN_APPROVE = 'Y' AND SHOP_BRAND = #{BRAND_NAME}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.BRAND_NAME, TG.TOTAL_GOODS_NAME, TG.TOTAL_GOODS_MODEL, TG.TOTAL_GOODS_PRICE, GI.GOODS_IMAGE_STD, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TOTAL_GOODS_NUM DESC) AS NUM FROM TOTAL_GOODS TG, BRAND B, GOODS_IMAGE GI WHERE TG.TOTAL_GOODS_NUM = GI.GOODS_IMAGE_PARENT AND B.BRAND_NUM = TG.TOTAL_GOODS_BRAND AND GI.GOODS_IMAGE_ORDER = 1 AND TG.TOTAL_GOODS_DEL_GB = 'N' AND (B.BRAND_NAME = #{BRAND_NAME} OR TG.TOTAL_GOODS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR TG.TOTAL_GOODS_MODEL LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{START} AND #{END}
